DOC.brief_summary: Double-Blind , Randomized , Single-Dose Study Evaluate Atrial Selectivity Safety BMS-394136 Subjects Implanted Dual-Chamber Pacemakers Defibrillators
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Assess Electrophysiologic Effects BMS-394136 Atrium Ventricle Patients With Dual-Chamber Pacemakers Defibrillators
DOC.criteria: Patients dualchamber pacemaker defibrillator Recent acute ischemic event Recent atrial ventricular arrhythmia Uncompensated heart failure Amiodarone use within last year Women childbearing potential QTc < 430 msec male QTc < 450 msec female
